caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 27–34. 27–33.
Helina flavoextrema
,
sp. nov. 27–30.
Male terminalia. 27. Sternite 5. 28. Cercal plate and surstylus, dorsal view. 29. Cercal plate and surstylus, lateral view. 30. Aedeagus, lateral view. 31–33. Female. 31. Ovipositor, dorsal view. 32. Ovipositor, ventral view and spermathecae. 33. Egg, lateral view. 34.
Limnophora longiantennata
,
sp. nov.
, ovipositor, lateral view and spermatheca.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Comments.
The species was described from a series of over 40 specimens from several localities in New Caledonia . The type-locality was Col de Pétchécara
.
